title: Twenty twisted tales
description: This book contains scenes of violence that some readers may find offensive.Twenty Fantastic short stories by R.B Clague each unique and quirky!From Vampire tales to board games between life and death there is something for every lover of good horror here and not always with a happy ending!Contents,BusinessContactCritiquePortentEffigyTrappedCountermoveHeistDataParallelsFurther BuisnessPerceptionChoicesBookcoversHereafterCharlieOddsPromisesPaybackClose of businessTwenty horrid tales that will leap from the page and twist their warped fingers around your mind!
author: R.B. Clague
